Text: I don't know, but it seems irresponsible not to mention the hard coded English and Chinese subtitles.
Is the audio as messed up in this one as in the 1.34GB re-encodes?
To answer my own question... it's almost as bad. I think I'll wait for a version with decent audio to appear before I watch it, none of the copies on here at the moment are worth my time.
I agree -- the audio is simply horrible. Such a shame because this looks like a great movie.
Thanks for the upload but the audio is pretty awful.

Yes, I should have said thanks too as I don't mean to sound ungrateful, but for me I don't want to ruin a movie with such awful audio. The picture is great however- hopefully soon there will be a better version available...
